text:
@GOPLeader China did lie to the world.
Donald Trump lied to our country:
He told us that 15 infections would soon be zero.
He told us the virus would disappear in the warm weather. 
He told us it was less deadly than the flu.
He also held several rallies.
#70days
#COVID19 
#Trumpvirus
